name: Ball — The Game —
description:
♦ Again, it has been a long long long long time after I published a new game.

♦ I was busy during the entire last year and during this month I finally created a game. It took me 27 hours(straight work) in 29 days to complete this game. I know it may sound small but it was colossal for me. Well, anyways here's the new game ♥

♦ I added a high score system to the game that works online.

♦ You need internet connection in order to have your scores be put on the online high score board but still you can play it offline as well once you have entered your username.

♦ I even added a Group system which allows a person to create a group and then invite his friends or colleagues or simply anyone from across the globe to play in the group. It is only β release but I am still trying to get a way to improve it as I proceed with the updates(not quite sure) ♥

♦ I added some background music as well a few sound effects and fixed a lot(literally a whole lot) of bugs.

♦ So just enjoy ♦

INSTRUCTIONS :-

▬   Use Arrow Keys or 'A' 'D' Keys to move around. 
▬   Use Spacebar to shoot.
▬   Use 'Esc' to pause the game.
▬   When using the Group system please remember that all the scores are deleted if the Host of the group leaves the group(I still haven't implemented a way for letting the other group members know that(or simply make them disconnect)) but I am thinking of creating a way for the same and that is why the Group system is still just a β release but you can get rid of the problem if you are playing with your friends as you can tell them that you are about to leave.

♦ PS: I am still working on the android version and I would try my best to make it available for download as soon as possible till then ciao ♦

SUPPORT it on - Patreon ☻
